languages.text: "В отличие от амасека. Амасеку можно верить — он всегда обманет". {n}Сладко улыбаясь, Джай вкладывает бокал вам в руку. Ее кожа словно светится изнутри, а смеющиеся огоньки в глазах пляшут подобно пламени.{/n}

"Unlike amasec. You can always trust amasec — it always lies." {n}Smiling sweetly, Jae presses your goblet into your hand. Her skin seems to glow from within, and the sparks of laughter in her eyes dance like flames.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В отличие от амасека. Амасеку можно верить — он всегда обманет". {n}Сладко улыбаясь, Джай вкладывает бокал вам в руку. Ее кожа словно светится изнутри, а смеющиеся огоньки в глазах пляшут подобно пламени.{/n}

"Unlike amasec. You can always trust amasec — it always lies." {n}Smiling sweetly, Jae presses your goblet into your hand. Her skin seems to glow from within, and the sparks of laughter in her eyes dance like flames.{/n}

"Unlike amasec. You can always trust amasec — it always lies." {n}Smiling sweetly, Jae presses your goblet into your hand. Her skin seems to glow from within, and the sparks of laughter in her eyes dance like flames.{/n}

"Unlike amasec. You can always trust amasec — it always lies." {n}Smiling sweetly, Jae presses your goblet into your hand. Her skin seems to glow from within, and the sparks of laughter in her eyes dance like flames.{/n}

languages.text: “这和艾玛赛克酒就不一样了。你永远可以相信艾玛赛克酒——它只会流出谎言。”{n}婕伊露出了甜甜的笑容，将高脚杯按在了你的手中。她的皮肤仿佛自内而外散发着光芒，眼中的笑意如火光般舞动。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike amasec. You can always trust amasec — it always lies." {n}Smiling sweetly, Jae presses your goblet into your hand. Her skin seems to glow from within, and the sparks of laughter in her eyes dance like flames.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这和艾玛赛克酒就不一样了。你永远可以相信艾玛赛克酒——它只会流出谎言。”{n}婕伊露出了甜甜的笑容，将高脚杯按在了你的手中。她的皮肤仿佛自内而外散发着光芒，眼中的笑意如火光般舞动。{/n}

languages.text: 「アマセックとは違う。アマセックは、いつだって信用できる…だって、いつだって嘘をつくから」{n}ジェイオは甘く微笑みながら、ゴブレットをあなたの手に押しつける。彼女の肌は内側から輝いているようで、その瞳には笑いの火花が炎のように散っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike amasec. You can always trust amasec — it always lies." {n}Smiling sweetly, Jae presses your goblet into your hand. Her skin seems to glow from within, and the sparks of laughter in her eyes dance like flames.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「アマセックとは違う。アマセックは、いつだって信用できる…だって、いつだって嘘をつくから」{n}ジェイオは甘く微笑みながら、ゴブレットをあなたの手に押しつける。彼女の肌は内側から輝いているようで、その瞳には笑いの火花が炎のように散っている。{/n}

languages.text: «A diferencia del amasec. Siempre puedes confiar en el amasec, porque siempre miente». {n}Con una sonrisa dulce, Jae te entrega tu copa en mano. Su piel parece brillar con luz propia y las chispas de la risa en sus ojos bailan como las llamas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike amasec. You can always trust amasec — it always lies." {n}Smiling sweetly, Jae presses your goblet into your hand. Her skin seems to glow from within, and the sparks of laughter in her eyes dance like flames.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «A diferencia del amasec. Siempre puedes confiar en el amasec, porque siempre miente». {n}Con una sonrisa dulce, Jae te entrega tu copa en mano. Su piel parece brillar con luz propia y las chispas de la risa en sus ojos bailan como las llamas.{/n}

languages.text: « À la différence de l'amasec, sur lequel vous pouvez toujours compter pour vous mentir. » {n}Souriant avec douceur, Jae pousse votre verre dans votre main. Sa peau semble briller de l'intérieur et les étincelles rieuses dans son regard dansent comme des flammes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike amasec. You can always trust amasec — it always lies." {n}Smiling sweetly, Jae presses your goblet into your hand. Her skin seems to glow from within, and the sparks of laughter in her eyes dance like flames.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « À la différence de l'amasec, sur lequel vous pouvez toujours compter pour vous mentir. » {n}Souriant avec douceur, Jae pousse votre verre dans votre main. Sa peau semble briller de l'intérieur et les étincelles rieuses dans son regard dansent comme des flammes.{/n}

languages.text: "Nicht so wie Amasec. Auf Amasec kann man sich immer verlassen – er lügt immer." {n}Jae lächelt süß und drückt dir deinen Becher in die Hand. Ihre Haut wirkt so, als würde sie von innen strahlen, und ihre Augen zeigen den Funken eines Lachens, der wie Flammen zu tanzen scheint.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike amasec. You can always trust amasec — it always lies." {n}Smiling sweetly, Jae presses your goblet into your hand. Her skin seems to glow from within, and the sparks of laughter in her eyes dance like flames.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nicht so wie Amasec. Auf Amasec kann man sich immer verlassen – er lügt immer." {n}Jae lächelt süß und drückt dir deinen Becher in die Hand. Ihre Haut wirkt so, als würde sie von innen strahlen, und ihre Augen zeigen den Funken eines Lachens, der wie Flammen zu tanzen scheint.{/n}

languages.text: "Amasekin aksine. Amaseke her zaman güvenebilirsin çünkü her zaman yalan söylediğini bilirsin." {n}Jae, tatlı tatlı gülümseyerek kadehini eline sıkıştırıyor. Teni içten içe parıldıyor, gözlerindeki kahkaha kıvılcımları ise alev alev dans ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unlike amasec. You can always trust amasec — it always lies." {n}Smiling sweetly, Jae presses your goblet into your hand. Her skin seems to glow from within, and the sparks of laughter in her eyes dance like flames.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Amasekin aksine. Amaseke her zaman güvenebilirsin çünkü her zaman yalan söylediğini bilirsin." {n}Jae tatlı tatlı gülümseyerek kadehini eline sıkıştırıyor. Teni içten içe parıldıyor gibi ve gözlerindeki kahkaha kıvılcımları alev alev dans ediyor.{/n}
